summary: This is a brief email exchange regarding scheduling a meeting between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and Stacey Richman, an attorney, concerning Mark Epstein. The email confirms a meeting set for October 28, 2019, at 3:00 p.m.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting Regarding Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting was confirmed for 3:00 p.m. between an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorney Stacey Richman to discuss Mark Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was scheduling a meeting with defense attorney Stacey Richman concerning Mark Epstein in October 2019.
The meeting was confirmed for 3:00 p.m. on Monday, October 28, 2019.
The email correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings or investigations involving Mark Epstein at that time.
